name: Jonita
description:
'''Jonita Gandhi''' (born October 23, 1989), credited mononymsly as '''Jonita''', is a Canadian singer known for her work in the [[Cinema of India|Indian film]] and [[Music industry of Asia|music industries]]. Since 2024, she has performed as a solo pop artist by releasing her debut Independent EP single ''Love Like That''.

She has recorded songs predominantly in [[Hindi]], [[Urdu]], [[Tamil language|Tamil]], [[Telugu language|Telugu]] languages with few in [[Punjabi language|Punjabi]], [[Marathi language|Marathi]], [[Gujarati language|Gujarati]], [[Bengali Language|Bengali]]. Some of her most acclaimed songs include "The Breakup Song", "Mental Manadhil". She is also well known for her YouTube presence. Her singing debut started through ''[[Chennai Express]]'' in 2013.
